trends: There has been one other sighting in Bullard
There were no other sightings in Bullard on or around April 28th 2010
Summary: object moved from south to north not the usual satelite path, it was uniquet in that ever few seconds its seemed to waiver to the side. it moved about a third faster than a satelite.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were in the hot tub star gazing and this object flew over it seemed to be much closer than a satelite it was shaped somewhere between an egg and a jellybean if it was covered in plasma. This object really really glowed and it wasnt traveling in a perfectly straight line, ever few seconds it seemed to change direction slightly. I have seen the shuttle and the space station fly over and it was different.
